alert.note: Alert for Baker; Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Calhoun; Clay; Colquitt; Cook; Decatur; Dougherty; Early; Grady; Irwin; Lanier; Lee; Lowndes; Miller; Mitchell; Quitman; Randolph; Seminole; Terrell; Thomas; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 05 at 2:28PM EDT until April 05 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 96 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 26 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN CLAY DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL QUITMAN RANDOLPH SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, ASHTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAGBY STATE PARK, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BENEVOLENCE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLAKELY, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYKIN, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CENTERVILLE, CHULA, CLARKS MILL, COLES, COLQUITT, COMMISSARY HILL, COOK CO A/P, COOKTOWN, CORDRAYS MILL, COTTLE, COTTON, COURTHOUSE, CROSSROADS, CUBA, CUTHBERT, DAVIS PARK, DAWSON, DAWSON MUNICIPAL A/P, DAYS CROSSROADS, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DILLON, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOUGLASVILLE, DOVEREL, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, EMPRESS, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, FORRESTER, FORT GAINES, GAMMAGE, GEORGETOWN, GORDY, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HARDING, HATCHER, HAWKINSTOWN, HEROD, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, IRWINVILLE, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, JONES CROSSING, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MASSEE, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MOORES CROSSROADS, MORGAN, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEWTON, OCILLA, PALMYRA, PASCO, PECAN, PELHAM, PETERSON HILL, PINE PARK, PINE VALLEY, PRETORIA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RICKS PLACE, RIVERTURN, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SHIVERS MILL, SMITHVILLE, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, SPRINGVALE, SPRINGVALE STATION, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TURNER CITY, UNION, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WALKER, WATERLOO, WEBER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WESTWOOD, WILLIAMSBURG, WIRE BRIDGE, WORTH, AND YEOMANS.
